channel.title: Compiler for CentOS
channel.description:
Hi, i made compiler for centos, but i have 1 erorr. Can anyone help?
[CODE]./compile.sh javac: file not found: srcserver*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options [/CODE] My Compiler: (SH) [QUOTE]javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\*.java src\server\engine\clip\*.java src\server\engine\clipegion\*.java src\server\engine\event\*.java src\server\engine\cycle\*.java src\server\engine
etwork\*.java src\server\engine\packet\*.java src\server\engine	ask\*.java src\server\engine\util\*.java src\server\engine\util\log\*.java src\server\engine\world\*.java src\server\engine\world\map\*.java src\servers2\content\*.java src\servers2\content\minigames\*.java src\servers2\content\skills\*.java src\servers2\entity\combat\*.java src\servers2\entity
pc\*.java src\servers2\entity\player\*.java src\servers2\items\*.java src\servers2\objects\*.java[/QUOTE] My Compiler: (BAT) [QUOTE]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_17 in\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\*.java src\server\engine\clip\*.java src\server\engine\clipegion\*.java src\server\engine\event\*.java src\server\engine\cycle\*.java src\server\engine
etwork\*.java src\server\engine\packet\*.java src\server\engine	ask\*.java src\server\engine\util\*.java src\server\engine\util\log\*.java src\server\engine\world\*.java src\server\engine\world\map\*.java src\servers2\content\*.java src\servers2\content\minigames\*.java src\servers2\content\skills\*.java src\servers2\entity\combat\*.java src\servers2\entity
pc\*.java src\servers2\entity\player\*.java src\servers2\items\*.java src\servers2\objects\*.java pause[/QUOTE]

item.title: Compiler for CentOS
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Change all the backslashes to forward slashes, they’re escape characters in bash.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler for CentOS
item.dc:creator: @Nikomaans Nikomaans
item.description:
@Nikomaans wrote:

Hi, i made compiler for centos, but i have 1 erorr. Can anyone help?

./compile.sh javac: file not found: srcserver*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options
My Compiler: (SH)

javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server*.java src\server\engine\clip*.java src\server\engine\clip\region*.java src\server\engine\event*.java src\server\engine\cycle*.java src\server\engine\network*.java src\server\engine\packet*.java src\server\engine\task*.java src\server\engine\util*.java src\server\engine\util\log*.java src\server\engine\world*.java src\server\engine\world\map*.java src\server\rs2\content*.java src\server\rs2\content\minigames*.java src\server\rs2\content\skills*.java src\server\rs2\entity\combat*.java src\server\rs2\entity\npc*.java src\server\rs2\entity\player*.java src\server\rs2\items*.java src\server\rs2\objects*.java

My Compiler: (BAT)

[QUOTE]@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_17\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server*.java src\server\engine\clip*.java src\server\engine\clip\region*.java src\server\engine\event*.java src\server\engine\cycle*.java src\server\engine\network*.java src\server\engine\packet*.java src\server\engine\task*.java src\server\engine\util*.java src\server\engine\util\log*.java src\server\engine\world*.java src\server\engine\world\map*.java src\server\rs2\content*.java src\server\rs2\content\minigames*.java src\server\rs2\content\skills*.java src\server\rs2\entity\combat*.java src\server\rs2\entity\npc*.java src\server\rs2\entity\player*.java src\server\rs2\items*.java src\server\rs2\objects*.java
pause[/QUOTE]
